Our goal is to create the most complete QR Code app on iPhone.
Please find in this update new awesome features that are making our app even more powerful.

For our professional users :
- we added some new exclusive QR code formats, with deep linking natively integrated, to create closer relationship with your end user
- Keep updated ! You will can track your professionally created code to follow usage and statistics :)

For all our users :
- we completed our product database thanks to new partnerships
- you can find even more nutritive informations for food products
- better integration with PDF417 format
- Soon : store your boarding pass directly inside our app !

Thanks to your feedbacks, we improved our pricing grid to make it more accurate to your needs.
Don’t worry, you can always take a 3 months or yearly offer to get the best prices of our professional offer :)

And as always, if you need help with subscription, pro or standard product, feel free to contact our fast-reacting support

Our goal is to create the best and most powerful QR Code & Barcode Scanner app on iPhone. 

On Barcode Scanner :
- NEW Feature, only available on this app: price history ! Get detailed informations about prices changes of a scanned product
- We improved the nutritional database. Scan food, and you’ll get detailed informations about what you eat

On QR Code :
- Track your campaigns clicks by OS, Device and Country
- You can customize the colors of your created QR Code

And as always, if you need help with subscription, pro or standard product, feel free to contact our fast-reacting support
